year in review 2022

2022

Another year flew by. 2021 continued with the remote-everything world of the previous year. I watched a number of movies, rejoined the world of academia only this time as a faculty member and helped ship some awesome new software products. Let's recap 2021! New TEXT NEDDED HERE

500K+ 10years &

Retired my Nikon D5100 camera after taking more than 500K photos over the last 10 years. It got soaked, sandy and freezing during its travels, but captured some awesome images!
